description.message: Move multiple tabs into a new window.

detach-to-the-right.message: This Tab and Tabs to the Right

detach-same-origin-across-windows.message: All Tabs from This Origin across All Windows

detach-this-tab-key-shortcut.message: Move the current tab to a new window

detach-to-the-right-key-shortcut.message: Detach current tab and all tabs to the right

detach-same-origin-key-shortcut.message: Detach all tabs with the same origin from this window

detach-same-origin-across-windows-key-sh.message: Detach all tabs with the same origin from all windows
